functionDecorators.name: getUserUnusedBalance
functionDecorators.description: FUnction to return users unused deposited balance including the return earned in markets.

parameterDecorators.name: _user
parameterDecorators.description: Address of user return PLOT Unused in deposit return PLOT Return from market return ETH Unused in deposit return ETH Return from market.

functionDecorators.name: addInitialMarketTypesAndStart
functionDecorators.description: Start the initial market and set initial variables.

functionDecorators.name: pauseMarketCreation
functionDecorators.description: Updates Flag to pause creation of market.

functionDecorators.name: depositAndPlacePrediction
functionDecorators.description: Deposit and Place prediction on the available options of the market.

parameterDecorators.name: _asset
parameterDecorators.description: The asset used by user during prediction whether it is plotToken address or in ether.

parameterDecorators.name: _predictionStake
parameterDecorators.description: The amount staked by user at the time of prediction.

parameterDecorators.name: _prediction
parameterDecorators.description: The option on which user placed prediction. _plotDeposit should be passed with 18 decimals, amount of ETH to deposit should be sent as msg.value _predictioStake should be passed with 8 decimals, reduced it to 8 decimals to reduce the storage space of prediction data.

functionDecorators.name: calculateStartTimeForMarket
functionDecorators.description: Calculate start time for next market of provided currency and market type indexes.

functionDecorators.name: placePrediction
functionDecorators.description: Place prediction on the available options of the market.

parameterDecorators.name: _asset
parameterDecorators.description: The asset used by user during prediction whether it is plotToken address or in ether.

parameterDecorators.name: _predictionStake
parameterDecorators.description: The amount staked by user at the time of prediction.

parameterDecorators.name: _prediction
parameterDecorators.description: The option on which user placed prediction. _predictioStake should be passed with 8 decimals, reduced it to 8 decimals to reduce the storage space of prediction data.

functionDecorators.name: marketCoolDownTime
functionDecorators.description: Get market cooldown time.

functionDecorators.name: getUserFlags
functionDecorators.description: Get flags set for user.

functionDecorators.name: setMasterAddress
functionDecorators.description: Changes the master address and update it's instance.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawReward
functionDecorators.description: Claim the pending return of the market.

parameterDecorators.name: maxRecords
parameterDecorators.description: Maximum number of records to claim reward for.

functionDecorators.name: raiseDispute
functionDecorators.description: Raise the dispute if wrong value passed at the time of market result declaration.

parameterDecorators.name: _proposedValue
parameterDecorators.description: The proposed value of market currency.

parameterDecorators.name: proposalTitle
parameterDecorators.description: The title of proposal created by user.

functionDecorators.name: sponsorIncentives
functionDecorators.description: Sponsor Incentive for the market.

functionDecorators.name: getTotalStakedValueInPLOT
functionDecorators.description: Returns total assets value in PLOT staked on market.

functionDecorators.name: marketSettleTime
functionDecorators.description: Get market settle time.

functionDecorators.name: getUserPredictionPoints
functionDecorators.description: Gets number of positions user got in prediction.

parameterDecorators.name: _option
parameterDecorators.description: Option Id return Number of positions user got in prediction.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawSponsoredIncentives
functionDecorators.description: Allows the incentive sponsorer of market to claim back his incentives incase of zero participation in market.

functionDecorators.name: marketStatus
functionDecorators.description: Gets the status of market.

functionDecorators.name: toggleMarketCreationType
functionDecorators.description: Set the flag to pause/resume market creation of particular market type.

functionDecorators.name: getTotalAssetsStaked
functionDecorators.description: Returns total assets staked in market by users.

functionDecorators.name: updateUintParameters
functionDecorators.description: function to update integer parameters.

functionDecorators.name: burnDisputedProposalTokens
functionDecorators.description: Burns the tokens of member who raised the dispute, if dispute is rejected.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw provided amount of deposited and available assets.

parameterDecorators.name: _maxRecords
parameterDecorators.description: Maximum number of records to check.

functionDecorators.name: claimIncentives
functionDecorators.description: Allows users to claim sponsored incentives of market.

parameterDecorators.name: _markets
parameterDecorators.description: Indexes of markets which user want to claim incentive for.

parameterDecorators.name: _incentiveToken
parameterDecorators.description: Incentive token to check rewards for User will pass a list of market id's to check for incentive of given token address, Incentive will be transferred to user if user had any and the incentive token of market is same as the one user had passed.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawMax
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw maximum possible deposited and available assets.

parameterDecorators.name: _maxRecords
parameterDecorators.description: Maximum number of records to check.

functionDecorators.name: getMarketResults
functionDecorators.description: Gets the result of the market.

functionDecorators.name: resumeMarketCreation
functionDecorators.description: Updates Flag to resume creation of market.

functionDecorators.name: createMarket
functionDecorators.description: Create the market.

parameterDecorators.name: _marketCurrencyIndex
parameterDecorators.description: The index of market currency feed.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: Function to deposit PLOT/ETH for participation in markets.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of PLOT to deposit msg.value => Amount of ETH to deposit.

functionDecorators.name: getReturn
functionDecorators.description: Gets the return amount of the specified address.

parameterDecorators.name: _user
parameterDecorators.description: The address to specify the return of.

functionDecorators.name: resolveDispute
functionDecorators.description: Resolve the dispute if wrong value passed at the time of market result declaration.

parameterDecorators.name: _result
parameterDecorators.description: The final proposed result of the market.

functionDecorators.name: getMarketData
functionDecorators.description: Gets the market data.

functionDecorators.name: addMarketType
functionDecorators.description: Add new market type.

parameterDecorators.name: _optionRangePerc
parameterDecorators.description: Option range percent of neutral min, max options (raised by 2 decimals).

functionDecorators.name: settleMarket
functionDecorators.description: Settle the market, setting the winning option.

functionDecorators.name: addMarketCurrency
functionDecorators.description: Add new market currency.

parameterDecorators.name: _marketFeed
parameterDecorators.description: Price Feed address of the currency.

parameterDecorators.name: decimals
parameterDecorators.description: Decimals of the price provided by feed address.

parameterDecorators.name: roundOfToNearest
parameterDecorators.description: Round of the price to nearest number.

functionDecorators.name: getTotalPredictionPoints
functionDecorators.description: Returns total prediction points allocated to users.
